mapper.insert: insert ignore into message(username,message_type, message,qq,phone,message_answer,message_state,create_time, answer_image,answer_username,praise_count) values (#{username},#{messageType},#{message},#{qq},#{phone},null,0,#{createTime}, null,null,0)
mapper.select: select message.message_type, message.message, message.message_state, message.create_time, message.answer_username, message.answer_image, message.message_answer, message.username, message.praise_count, user.user_image from message inner join user on message.username = user.username where message.username = #{username} order by message.create_time desc

select message.message_id, message.message_type, message.create_time, message.message_state, message.message, message.message_answer, message.phone, message.answer_username, message.answer_image, message.praise_count, user.username, user.user_image from message inner join user on message.username = user.username order by message.create_time desc

select message.message_type, message.create_time, message.message, message.message_state, message.message_id, message.answer_username, message.answer_image, user.username, user.user_image from message message inner join user on message.username = user.username where message_state = 1 order by message.create_time desc

select message.message_type, message.create_time, message.message, message.message_state, message.message_id, message.phone, user.username, user.user_image from message message inner join user on message.username = user.username where message_state = 0 order by message.create_time desc
mapper.update: update message set message_answer = #{messageAnswer}, answer_image = #{answerImage}, answer_username = #{answerUsername}, message_state = 1 where message_id = #{messageId}
mapper.select: select message.message_type, message.message, message.message_state, message.create_time, message.answer_username, message.answer_image, message.message_answer, message.answer_image, message.message_id, message.username, message.praise_count, user.user_image from message inner join user on message.username = user.username where message.message_type = #{messageType} order by message.create_time desc
mapper.update: update message set praise_count = (praise_count +1) where message_id = #{messageId}
